Hero Description: Pioneering a new era in agriculture through breakthrough technologyâ€”ushering in seamless, AI-driven plant disease detection and intelligent monitoring at unprecedented scale, empowering farmers worldwide to cultivate healthier crops, maximize yields, and redefine the future of sustainable farming.
features.heading: Comprehensive Features for both Domestic as well as Rural Agriculture
features.subheading: Discover how Vitalis can transform modern agricultural methods with innovative features.
features.crop_health.title: Crop Health Tracking
features.crop_health.description: Monitor plant vitals and health metrics with precision and ease.
features.data_analytics.title: Data Analytics
features.data_analytics.description: Gain insights through powerful analytics and personalized reports on crops.
features.realtime_monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
features.realtime_monitoring.description: Track crop health in real-time with instant notifications and alerts.
features.ai_detection.title: AI-Powered Crop Disease Detection
features.mobile_integration.title: Mobile Integration
features.mobile_integration.description: Seamlessly sync across all your devices with our mobile-first approach.
features.community_support.title: Community Support
features.community_support.description: Connect with like-minded individuals on our platform.
about.title: About Vitalis
about.description: Vitalis is a full-stack mobile and web application empowering farmers and home gardeners with actionable insights to enhance agricultural productivity through cutting-edge technology.
about.feature1.title: Intuitive Dashboard
about.feature1.description: Real-time insights on crop health parameters such as temperature, humidity, soil moisture along with crucial metrics such as evapotranspiration (ET rate) and deep percolation for analyzing root health.
about.feature2.title: AI-Powered Crop Disease Detection
about.feature2.description: Uses deep learning techniques to detect diseases from leaf images, enabling fast, accurate diagnosis and early intervention.
about.feature3.title: Cost-Effective & Scalable
about.feature3.description: Eliminates lab tests, deployable on smartphones, accessible globally, and ideal for both large-scale farmers and small-scale domestic agriculture.
about.feature4.title: Sustainability
about.feature4.description: Reduces pesticide use through smart farm management systems for automated, tech-driven farming that supports environmental health.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: To democratize agricultural technology by making advanced farming insights accessible to everyone from commercial farmers to home gardeners, promoting sustainable practices and improving food security worldwide.
prompt: Login with either Username or Mobile Number
enter_username_or_mobile: Please enter either Username or Mobile Number
heading: Sign Up
error_password: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
weather_summary.mild_desc: Great weather for most crops today.
warm_rain_desc: The weather is warm with some rainfall.
subtle_clear_desc: Mild conditions with no rain and clear skies.
soil_summary.optimal_desc: Ideal soil moisture and balance for crops.
symptom1: Light brown spots on leaf edges
cures.earlyBlight.0: Use fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
cures.earlyBlight.2: Ensure proper spacing to reduce humidity.
cures.moderateBlight.1: Avoid overhead watering to reduce leaf wetness.
cures.moderateBlight.2: Prune lower leaves to improve airflow.
cures.lateBlight.1: Remove infected plants to prevent spread.
cure1: Apply Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil fungicides as per agricultural guidelines.
cure2: Avoid overhead irrigation to reduce leaf wetness.
cure3: Ensure proper crop rotation and remove infected debris.
cure4: Use fungicides like Azoxystrobin or Copper-based sprays.
cure5: Maintain proper spacing and airflow between plants.
cure6: Irrigate early in the day to allow foliage to dry.
cure7: Apply systemic fungicides such as Metalaxyl or Ridomil Gold.
cure8: Destroy infected plants and avoid planting in the same area.
cure9: Monitor closely during cool and wet weather conditions.
